attributes.title: Somethings off about this app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app a couple of days ago and before that my phone was fine. After a couple of days ago... my phone started crashing and glitching out. Keep in mind that my phone is brand new, I just got it 1 month ago. I deleted the app two days ago and now my phone is doing alright. i don't know if the app downloaded some virus or something on my phone but I do not suggest downloading.
